Ouro </p></div></div><div class="_label_event"><p class="feed-post-body-resumo">Em casa, Glorioso aposta no talento dos americanos Jamaal Smith e Wes pelo triunfo que garante a manutenção da liderança     var glb_realtime_map = {
        site: 'globoesporte',
        categories: ['home'],
        url: 'http://globoesporte.globo.com/basquete/'
    };

    var realtime = function(realtimeLoaded, msg){
        if(realtimeLoaded){
            return;
        }

        $.getScript('http://s.glbimg.com/bu/rt/js/glb-rt.js', function(){
            $.ajax({
                dataType: 'jsonp',
                
                url: 'http://s.glbimg.com/es/ge/static/live/globoesporte/json/globoesporte-home-agregador.js',
                
                jsonpCallback: 'glbrealtime_callback',
                cache: true,
                success: function(json){
                    $.glbrealtime({
                        data: json,
                        debug: false
                    });
                }
            });
        });
    }

    var realtimeLoaded = false;

    $(window).on('load', function(){
        realtime(realtimeLoaded, "onLoad");
        realtimeLoaded = true;
    })

    setTimeout(function(){
        realtime(realtimeLoaded, "timeout")
        realtimeLoaded = true;
    }, 3000);

</script><link rel="stylesheet"
                  media="screen"
                  href="//s.glbimg.com/gl/ba/css/barra-globocom.min.css"
                  type="text/css"/><script type="text/javascript">(function(){glb.barra={exibeAssineJa:true,exibeCentral:true,iframe:false};var s=document.createElement("script");s.type="text/javascript";s.async=true;s.charset="utf-8";s.src="//s.glbimg.com/gl/ba/js/barra-globocom.min.js";var ss=document.getElementsByTagName("script")[0];ss.parentNode.insertBefore(s,ss);})();</script><style type="text/css">

    display: none !important;
  }
}

}

}

<section class="man">
    <div class="man__content i-content">

        <figure class="man__photo">
            <div class="man__photo__visual">
                <img class="man__photo__visual__image" src="/sites/default/files/Edith-Elkind.png" alt="EDITH ELKIND" />
            </div>
        </figure>

        <div class="man__data">
                        <a class="man__faculty" href="/courses/computer-science">Computer Science</a>

            <h1 class="man__name title">
                                <!-- <span class="man__name__first man__name__first_long">Ingo Beyer Von</span> -->
                <span class="man__name__first">EDITH</span>
                <span class="man__name__last">ELKIND</span>
            </h1>

            <article class="man__summary">
                <!-- <dl class="man__info man__info_type man__info_type_theorist"> -->
                <dl class="man__info man__info_type man__info_type_theorist">
                    <dt class="man__info__title">Current position</dt>
                    <dd class="man__info__value text">PhD, Computer Science Professor at Oxford University</dd>
                </dl>
                                <dl>
                    <dt class="man__info__title">Skills</dt>
                    <dd class="man__info__value text">Algorithms<br />Game theory<br />Voting<br />Auctions<br />Cooperation <br><br /> <p></p></dd>
                </dl>
                                                                                                <dl class="man__info">
                    <dt class="man__info__title">Social</dt>
                    <dd class="man__info__value man__social">
                                                                        <a class="man__social__item man__social__item_fb" target="_blank" href="https://www.facebook.com/edith.elkind"></a>                                                                        <a class="man__social__item man__social__item_gs ai ai-google-scholar" target="_blank" href="https://scholar.google.com/citations?user=MsGRzsoAAAAJ"></a>                    </dd>
                </dl>
                            </article>

            <article class="man__details">
                                <div class="man__detail">
                    <h2 class="man__detail__title title title_secondary">THE COURSES</h2>
                    <div class="man__detail__intro text">
                        <p></p>
                    </div>
                    <div class="man__detail__text text">
                                                    <p><ul>
<li> omplexity Theory </li>
</ul>
</p>
                                            </div>
                </div>
                                <div class="man__detail">
                    <h2 class="man__detail__title title title_secondary">About</h2>
                    <div class="man__detail__intro text">
                        <p></p>
                    </div>
                    <div class="man__detail__text text">
                                                    <p>Dr. Elkind researches game theory and the computation of social choices. She looks at the decisions involved in multi-agent systems such as auctions, elections and co-operative games.</p>
                                                    <p>Dr. Elkind joined the Oxford Computer Science Department in 2013. Prior to coming to Oxford she was an Assistant Professor at Nanyang Technological University (Singapore), where her research was supported by the National Research foundation (NRF) Fellowship. </p>
                                                    <p>Dr. Elkind obtained her PhD from Princeton University in 2005, and was a postdoctoral research fellow at the University of Warwick, University of Liverpool and Hebrew University of Jerusalem, as well as a lecturer (Roberts Fellow) at University of Southampton.</p>
                                            </div>
                </div>
                                <div class="man__detail">
                    <h2 class="man__detail__title title title_secondary">Selected Publications</h2>
                    <div class="man__detail__intro text">
                        <p></p>
                    </div>
                    <div class="man__detail__text text">
                                                    <p><ul>
<li> Yair Zick Edith Elkind and Evangelos Markakis. Arbitration and Stability in Cooperative Games with Overlapping Coalitions. In J. Artif. Intell. Res. (JAIR). Pages to appear. 2014.
<li> John Augustine Ning Chen Edith Elkind Angelo Fanelli Nick Gravin and Dmitry Shiryaev. Dynamics of ProfitSharing Games. In Internet Mathematics. Pages to appear. 2014.
<li> Edith Elkind, Martin Lackner. On Detecting Nearly Structured Preference Profiles. In AAAI. Pages 661667. 2014.
</ul>
</p>
                                            </div>
                </div>
                                            </article>

        </div>

    </div>

    
</section>
<!--/Man -->

    <section class="user user-start" id="user-start">
